gytisdudasobfuscate@gmail.com

I was a Mahan Postdoctoral Fellow with the Bedford lab at the Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center where I worked on or contributed to phylogenetic studies of RNA virus outbreak dynamics:

  • Genome-wide evolutionary dynamics of influenza B viruses on a global scale led by Pinky Langat
  • Genomic epidemiology reveals multiple introductions of Zika virus into the United States led by Nathan Grubaugh
  • Virus genomes reveal factors that spread and sustained the Ebola epidemic in collaboration with Andrew Rambaut, Philippe Lemey, Luiz Max Carvalho, Andrew Tatem, and Marc Suchard
  • MERS-CoV spillover at the camel-human interface

I am now based in Europe and you can keep up to date with what I get up to on my website.
